en.title: Add information to a case
en.hint: Please provide any additional relevant information that you would like to add to this case. Don't include personal financial information, such as your bank details.
en.line1: You may want to submit other documents, files or evidence that provides the Tribunal with more information about your case.
en.line2: This will depend on the nature of your appeal, application or claim.  Specific examples can be found in your completed tribunal form.
en.line4: Please explain why you feel this document is relevant to your case
en.uploadExamples:
• copies of any relevant correspondence or documentation
  • audio or video recordings
  • written statements
  • related reports
en.uploadRequirement:
• File formats: MS Word, MS Excel, PDF, JPG, PNG, TXT, RTF, MP4, MP3
  • File size per document: up to 20 megabytes (MB)
  • File size per multimedia file: 30 megabytes (MB)
  • Files cannot be password protected

You can’t upload executable (.exe), .zip or other archive files due to virus risks.
en.uploadGuidance: Once you have selected the file click "Upload file" to upload it.
en.additionalInfo: For each piece of additional information or evidence you are submitting, please state why it is relevant to your case.

en.SIZE_ERROR: File size exceeds the maximum permitted value. Please upload a file that is less than 50 MB (documents) or less than 100 MB (multimedia files)
en.FORMAT_ERROR: This service only accepts files in the formats - Ms Word, MS Excel, PDF, JPG, PNG, TXT, RTF, MP4, MP3
en.TOTAL_FILES_EXCEED_ERROR: You can upload 20 files only. Please delete one of the uploaded files and retry
en.NO_FILE_UPLOAD_ERROR: Please choose a file to upload
en.UPLOAD_DELETE_FAIL_ERROR: Document upload or deletion has failed. Please try again
